Rule.Name: ClassUnderEntitiesNamespaceMustBePublic
Rule.Context: All classes under namespace endwith ".Entities" must be public.
Rule.Description: All classes under namespace endwith ".Entities" must be public.

Rule.Name: ClassUnderEntitiesNamespaceMustHavePublicId
Rule.Context: All classes under namespace endwith ".Entities" must have public property "Id".
Rule.Description: All classes under namespace endwith ".Entities" must have public property "Id".

Rule.Name: ClassUnderEntitiesNamespaceMustHaveAttribute
Rule.Context: All classes under namespace must have Attribute [DataContract].
Rule.Description: All classes under namespace must have Attribute [DataContract].

Rule.Name: ClassUnderEntitiesNamespaceMustHavePublicName
Rule.Context: All classes under namespace endwith ".Entities" must have public property "Name".
Rule.Description: All classes under namespace endwith ".Entities" must have public property "Name".

Rule.Name: SystemWebMvcControllerMustHaveSuffixController
Rule.Context: Class inherited from System.Web.Mvc.Controller must have suffix controller.
Rule.Description: Class inherited from System.Web.Mvc.Controller must have suffix controller.

Rule.Name: SystemWebMvcControllerMustHaveAttribute
Rule.Context: Class inherited from System.Web.Mvc.Controller must have attribute "Authorize" or all its public method.
Rule.Description: Class inherited from System.Web.Mvc.Controller must have attribute "Authorize" or all its public method.
